resources.string: An apple is a crisp and sweet fruit, rich in vitamins and fiber.
A banana is a soft fruit that is high in potassium and energy, perfect for post-workout.
A cherry is a small, sweet fruit often used in desserts and jams.
A lemon is a sour fruit commonly used in drinks and flavoring, rich in vitamin C.
A lychee is a tropical fruit with juicy, tender flesh and a sweet flavor.
The mango is known as the \'king of fruits\' for its deliciously sweet flesh.
The mangosteen is a purple fruit with a white interior, known for its unique and sweet flavor.
An orange is a juicy fruit rich in vitamin C, great for eating fresh or juicing.
A pear is a water-rich fruit with a crisp texture, perfect for eating fresh or in desserts.
A pineapple is a tropical fruit that is sweet and tangy, often used in salads and drinks.
A strawberry is a small red fruit that is sweet and rich in antioxidants.
A watermelon is a summer fruit that is hydrating and refreshing.
